 2003-17242003-11-04,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActCanadian Centre for Management Development Act
PrecisReappointment of ROBERT G. WRIGHT, of Tokyo, Japan, employed in the Public Service, to be a governor of the Canadian Centre for Management Development, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective December 5, 2003.
